longBusinessSummary: Suratwwala Business Group Limited, a real estate development company, engages in the construction of residential, commercial, and IT parks properties in India. The company provides maintenance services for its developed properties, including housekeeping, security, and power backup. It also engages in renting of immovable properties and provision of other related business auxiliary services. In addition, the company installs and commissions solar power plants for various customers, including industries, residential communities, commercial outlets, restaurants, hospitals, and corporate houses. Suratwwala Business Group Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Pune, India.
